metadata.name: HamNafas ❖ Calligraphy
metadata.description:
The beauty of Persian calligraphy in poetry for the first time in the NFT by:
© Foad Memariaan

Lyrics by “Saadi” one of the great poet in the world.
Narration, Vocal, Music, Design and video: Foad Memariaan.
This is the first NFT of the Persian / Arabic calligraphy of @Memariaan.
The Other Artworks of collection, will be released soon.
